attributes.action: build at least two nuclear power units at the Sellafield facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the announcement of the Governments intention facilitate the construction of new nuclear power stations, it is the opinion of the signatories that at least two nuclear power units should be built in the area which has provided over 50 years support to the nuclear industry at Sellafield, where proud local nuclear workers who are experienced in working in such an environment can have their careers secured for many years to come.  Also, this would facilitate a well needed injection to the local West Cumbrian economy.
